transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello. Ji sir ji boliye.
Executive: Namaste sir India Mart se baat kar rahi hu.
Customer: Ha ji bolo. Hello.
Executive: Ji sir. Ha sun raha hu sun raha hu aachi hai.
Customer: Ji. Sir actually kuch fir se complaint open hui thi ye Mohit Pandey ki aapke against. Eramis Eramis mere ke regarding sir.
Customer: To iske bare mein matlab kya abhi update chal raha hai isme Mohit unke naam se complaint. Mohit ji ne se baat kar sakta hu.
Executive: Actually isme kya hai na ki India Mart. Yes sir.
Customer: Kab hui hai? Hello.
Executive: Ha kab hui hai?
Customer: Sir ye na ye complaint open ki gayi thi 26th November ko. 26th November ko open ki gayi thi isme update hai ki Mohit jo hai wo already payment unhone diya tha product ka 28th September ko. Thik hai? Fir supplier jo hai matlab aap jo hai unko information nahi provide kiya hai aapne aur fir ye sari chizo ka aapko India Mart ka jo legal team hota hai wo aapko call bhi ki hogi aap se matlab jo hota hai dispute amount kiya gaya tha ki 50 55000 ka dispute amount tha isme 55000 ka dispute amount.
Customer: Main check karke aapko batata hu.
Executive: Ji sir Mohit jo hai usne payment aapko diya tha 28th September ko product ke liye jisme net banking mode of payment unka net banking ka tha aur dispute amount jo tha unka 55000 ka tha. To isme kya hai Mohit ne complaint ki thi ki wo abhi kya hai ki abhi unka jo product hai wo deliver nahi hua aisa karke. To iske bare mein aapko India Mart ke platform se jo legal team hoti hai usne aapko call bhi kiya hoga isme iske regarding.
Customer: Nahi mere paas koi call nahi aaya sir.
Executive: Abhi kya hai aapka aapka pre buyer conflict arise ho sakta hai jaise ki abhi kya hai initial stage mein hai to isme kya hai ki resolution aapko lena padega kyunki isme 55000 ka dispute amount mention kar raha hai product means jo jiske liye usne kiya tha payment jo buyer hai wo dust stick machine ke liye tha. Thik hai sir? Aur ek number bhi hai main aapko wo number bhi de deti hu ye Mohit Pandey ka jo buyer hai jisne ye complaint ki thi agar ye number 626585 4399 karke hai.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: To aap inse baat karke ek bar ek bar note kar lijiyega aap number aapko waise idea hoga nahi to nahi hai to fir number note kar lijiye aur inse baat karke matlab agar aapka ye resolve ho jata to sahi rehta kyunki abhi kya hai ki abhi initially hai to complaint close ho jati hai as soon as possible agar ho jayega to.
Customer: Thik hai main baat kar leta hu.
Executive: Thik hai sir. Ji aur sir ek bar na ye calls wagera ka main aapko inform kar de rahi hu services abhi kya hai main to just aapka account handle kar rahi hu service India Mart wali. To isse main ek bar iske related bhi inform kar de rahi hu main aapko services ke regarding ki calls na thodi miss ho rahi hai aap wali. Jaise ye dono number aapke jo register karaye hain ye 811 wala number jo hai last mein aur 994 wala to in dono number pe jo India Mart ke buyer ki calls jati hai na dono number pe to in dono number pe kuch calls jo hai wo abhi system mein miss calls dikha rahi hai jisme in total. Nahi nahi mujhe ye janna hai kal mere paas India Mart buyer se do call aaye the.
Customer: Hmm. Hello. Ji.
Executive: Kal sir India Mart buyer se do call aaye the aur main dono isi ke mein voice nahi aa rahi thi.
Customer: Lekin jab main usko check karne ke liye lead manager khola to usme unka naam hi nahi aa raha tha.
Executive: Unka naam nahi aa raha tha usme na aap calls directly check kar sakte hain lead manager apna open karenge na to jo ek upar. Ha nahi wo maine call bhi check kiya hai. Ha call check kiya usme all leads receive hai na ye sari chiz usme dikha rahi hai lekin usme call mein jo main check kar raha hu receiving mein uske call time dikhai nahi de raha kisne call kiya.
Customer: Call miss call mein nahi dikha rahi thi aapko ya fir koi call hi nahi dikhai. Usme kya hai na ki ek jaise filter rehta hai wo apply karenge na to aapko sari calls ka data dikhega. Ek jaise lead manager open karenge to jahan se wo search karne ka rehta hai na usi ke right side mein ek filter rehta hai filter jaisa option rehta hai us pe click karenge to source mein ja ke aapko call select karna padega. Then call select karna padega apply karenge filter rehta hai filter ek lead manager open karenge na to right upar ke upar ko jo three three lines dikh rahi hongi aapko three lines upar se. Hmm. Ha. Then usi ke exactly right mein ek filter dikh raha hoga wo triangle jaisa.
Customer: Nahi mam nahi dikh raha mere ko.
Executive: Jo ye lead product city company karke diya hai na usi ke right mein.
Customer: Mam ek kam karta hu main laptop khol ke aap se baat karta hu fir lagata hu aapko call fir dekho dekh lena.
Executive: Thik hai sir thik hai. Okay ji. Okay ji. Okay ji. Fir wale se kya baat hui? Ye...
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received calls without voice. 

- Customer's lead manager not showing caller name.

- Complaint filed against customer for non-delivery.



Resolution:

- Executive provided Mohit Pandey's contact number.

- Executive explained how to check call details in lead manager.

- Executive informed about missed calls.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call back after checking on laptop.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- complaint, refund, lead manager, calls, dispute
